description: IdMappingWorkflow defined in AWS Entity Resolution service

EntityName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z_0-9-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

AttributeName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z_0-9- \t]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

SchemaMappingArn.description: The SchemaMapping arn associated with the Schema
SchemaMappingArn.markdownDescription:
The SchemaMapping arn associated with the Schema

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):entityresolution:.*:[0-9]+:(schemamapping/.*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

KMSArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):kms:.*:[0-9]+:.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

IdMappingWorkflowArn.markdownDescription:
The default IdMappingWorkflow arn

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):entityresolution:.*:[0-9]+:(idmappingworkflow/.*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

The time of this IdMappingWorkflow got created

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

UpdatedAt.description: The time of this IdMappingWorkflow got last updated at
UpdatedAt.markdownDescription:
The time of this IdMappingWorkflow got last updated at

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

InputSourceARN.description: An Glue table ARN for the input source table or IdNamespace ARN
InputSourceARN.markdownDescription:
An Glue table ARN for the input source table or IdNamespace ARN

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):.*:.*:[0-9]+:.*$

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Type.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Allowed Values: SOURCE | TARGET

---

OutputS3Path.markdownDescription:
The S3 path to which Entity Resolution will write the output table

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^s3://([^/]+)/?(.*?([^/]+)/?)$  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Allowed Values: PROVIDER

IdMappingTechniques.markdownDescription:

ProviderServiceArn.description: Arn of the Provider Service being used.
ProviderServiceArn.markdownDescription:
Arn of the Provider Service being used.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):entityresolution:([A-Za-z0-9]+(-[A-Za-z0-9]+)+)::providerservice/[A-Za-z0-9]+/[A-Za-z0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

^.+$.markdownDescription:

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption
